hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo on PATH PATH=%PATH%C:\Program Files\Git\cmd; PATH
set mytime=%time:~0,2%%time:~3,2%%time:~6,2% set mydate=%date:~-4%%date:~4,2%%date:~7,2% set mytime=%mytime: =0% set timestamp=%mydate%_%mytime% echo %TIMESTAMP%
cd %JENKINS_HOME%/.. for /f "tokens=*" %%f in ('cd') do ( set BACKUP_HOME=%%f\Jenkins_Backup )
cd %BACKUP_HOME% for /f "tokens=*" %%f in ('dir /b') do ( echo %%f del /S /Q "%BACKUP_HOME%\%%f" rmdir /S /Q "%BACKUP_HOME%\%%f" )
mkdir "%BACKUP_HOME%\%TIMESTAMP%" cd "%BACKUP_HOME%\%TIMESTAMP%"
git config --global user.name "kennedd-github" git init whoami git config --system --unset credential.helper git config --list git config --system --list
git clone --progress --verbose https://github.com/kennedd-github/agt-launch-jenkins-configuration.git
cd "%BACKUP_HOME%\%TIMESTAMP%\agt-launch-jenkins-configuration" if not exist "%BACKUP_HOME%\%TIMESTAMP%\agt-launch-jenkins-configuration\Jenkins" mkdir Jenkins xcopy /s "%JENKINS_HOME%" "Jenkins" /E /Y /B git add . git status git commit -m "Jenkins Configuration Backup %TIMESTAMP%" git push
:End
